name: AI
description: Artificial Intelligence enables machines to mimic human intelligence for tasks like problem-solving, decision-making, and automation.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Delivers computing services like storage, databases, and servers over the internet, ensuring scalability and cost-efficiency.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Protects systems, networks, and data from cyber threats using encryption, firewalls, and secure authentication methods.

name: Data Science
description: Extracts insights from structured and unstructured data using statistics, machine learning, and analytical techniques.

name: DevOps
description: Combines development and operations to automate software deployment, improve collaboration, and ensure continuous integration and delivery.

name: Game Development
description: Involves designing, coding, and creating video games using game engines like Unity or Unreal Engine.

name: Machine Learning
description: A subset of AI that enables computers to learn from data and make predictions without explicit programming.

name: Mobile Development
description: Focuses on creating applications for mobile devices using platforms like Android (Kotlin) and iOS (Swift).

name: Web Development
description: Builds and maintains websites and web applications using frontend, backend, and full-stack technologies.
